ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities include significant updates to osu!taiko, focusing on rhythm penalty considerations, star rating and performance points rebalancing, and stamina balancing. These changes aim to enhance gameplay experience by introducing more nuanced difficulty calculations and rewards for players.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: The repository has seen notable updates with the addition of tournament articles, such as the ANZT6W tournament, and retranslations of game mode text. These contributions improve the wiki's coverage of osu! community events and enhance its multilingual support.

ppy/SDL3-CS.summary: Recent activity involves updating bindings to include pen support for iOS and Android, leveraging developments from the SDL library. This update also removes unnecessary files, positioning the project for future compatibility and framework integration.
